short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay Focused is an app to block distracting sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay Focused is an app to block distracting sites. Users can easily block sites with the simple click of a button when they want to do work. Then, as they are doing work, if they get distracted and visit a site that they have blocked, they are redirected to a page which tells them to do their work. When they are done working, they can easily unblock all sites with a single click of a button. If they ever want to check which sites they have blocked, they just need to click the popup window and a list of all the blocked sites will appear or a message saying there are no blocked sites if no sites are blocked.
